<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;Bndl = BndlPtr.get();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Bndls&#91;Bndl&#93; = std::move(BndlPtr);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Bndl;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Scheduler::eraseBundle(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/schedbundle">SchedBundle</a> &#42;SB) &#123; Bndls.erase(SB); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Scheduler::tryScheduleUntil(ArrayRef&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt; Instrs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use a set of instructions, instead of &#96;Instrs&#96; for fast lookups.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">  DenseSet&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt; InstrsToDefer(Instrs.begin(), Instrs.end());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This collects the nodes that correspond to instructions found in &#96;Instrs&#96;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that have just become ready. These nodes won&#39;t be scheduled right away.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8fc529c79977cdd01e187986f960a07f">SmallVector&lt;DGNode &#42;, 8&gt;</a> DeferredNodes;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Keep scheduling ready nodes until we either run out of ready nodes (i.e.,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ReadyList is empty), or all nodes that correspond to &#96;Instrs&#96; (the nodes of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// which are collected in DeferredNodes) are all ready to schedule.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ReadyList.empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;ReadyN = ReadyList.pop();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (InstrsToDefer.contains(ReadyN-&gt;getInstruction())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the ready instruction is one of those in &#96;Instrs&#96;, then we don&#39;t</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// schedule it right away. Instead we defer it until we can schedule it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// along with the rest of the instructions in &#96;Instrs&#96;, at the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// time in a single scheduling bundle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">      DeferredNodes.push&#95;back(ReadyN);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ReadyToScheduleDeferred = DeferredNodes.size() == Instrs.size();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ReadyToScheduleDeferred) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">        scheduleAndUpdateReadyList(&#42;createBundle(Instrs));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the ready instruction is not found in &#96;Instrs&#96;, then we wrap it in a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// scheduling bundle and schedule it right away.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">      scheduleAndUpdateReadyList(&#42;createBundle(&#123;ReadyN-&gt;getInstruction()&#125;));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(DeferredNodes.size() != Instrs.size() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;We should have succesfully scheduled and early-returned!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">Scheduler::BndlSchedState</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">Scheduler::getBndlSchedState(ArrayRef&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt; Instrs)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!Instrs.empty() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expected non-empty bundle&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> PartiallyScheduled = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FullyScheduled = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : Instrs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> = DAG.getNode(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;scheduled())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PartiallyScheduled = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">      FullyScheduled = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FullyScheduled) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If not all instrs in the bundle are in the same SchedBundle then this</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// should be considered as partially-scheduled, because we will need to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// re-schedule.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlight">    SchedBundle &#42;SB = DAG.getNode(Instrs&#91;0&#93;)-&gt;getSchedBundle();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SB != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;FullyScheduled assumes that there is an SB!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a61d13d6824ec46c31260a4fd0997eda0">any&#95;of</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a02981de53fb6ffd384d39addc4d25f37">drop&#95;begin</a>(Instrs), &#91;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, SB&#93;(sandboxir::Value &#42;SBV) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DAG.getNode(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;sandboxir::Instruction&gt;</a>(SBV))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlight">                     -&gt;getSchedBundle() != SB;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">      FullyScheduled = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FullyScheduled       ? BndlSchedState::FullyScheduled</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlight">         : PartiallyScheduled ? BndlSchedState::PartiallyOrDifferentlyScheduled</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              : BndlSchedState::NoneScheduled;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Scheduler::trimSchedule(ArrayRef&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt; Instrs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a75d3582b0f0bc7a5123de92ada301e97">Instruction</a> &#42;TopI = &amp;&#42;ScheduleTopItOpt.value();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a75d3582b0f0bc7a5123de92ada301e97">Instruction</a> &#42;LowestI = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#a089cccbe66baa77d85c8a291030c7796">VecUtils::getLowest</a>(Instrs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Destroy the schedule bundles from LowestI all the way to the top.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = LowestI, &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> = TopI-&gt;getPrevNode(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">       <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getPrevNode()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> = DAG.getNode(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;SB = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;getSchedBundle())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlight">      eraseBundle(SB);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: For now we clear the DAG. Trim view once it gets implemented.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Bndls.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  DAG.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Since we are scheduling NewRegion from scratch, we clear the ready lists.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The nodes currently in the list may not be ready after clearing the View.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ReadyList.clear();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/scheduler/#a9c67d906d22a6018e3ff649bafed6a1a"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/scheduler/#a9c67d906d22a6018e3ff649bafed6a1a">Scheduler::trySchedule</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt;</a> Instrs) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0d10fe510ced2849a8074fe81e5d04ce">all&#95;of</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a02981de53fb6ffd384d39addc4d25f37">drop&#95;begin</a>(Instrs),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">                &#91;Instrs&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">                  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getParent() == (&#42;Instrs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#aab36927882fbfdcbb860d87fd9c30da8">begin</a>())-&gt;getParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">                &#125;) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">         </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Instrs not in the same BB, should have been rejected by Legality!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ScheduledBB == </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ScheduledBB = Instrs&#91;0&#93;-&gt;getParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We don&#39;t support crossing BBs for now.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a61d13d6824ec46c31260a4fd0997eda0">any&#95;of</a>(Instrs,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">             &#91;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">this</span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getParent() != ScheduledBB; &#125;))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SchedState = getBndlSchedState(Instrs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">switch</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (SchedState) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BndlSchedState::FullyScheduled:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Nothing to do.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BndlSchedState::PartiallyOrDifferentlyScheduled:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If one or more instrs are already scheduled we need to destroy the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// top-most part of the schedule that includes the instrs in the bundle and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// re-schedule.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><span class="doxyHighlight">    trimSchedule(Instrs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#91;&#91;fallthrough&#93;&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> BndlSchedState::NoneScheduled: &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: Set the window of the DAG that we are interested in.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We start scheduling at the bottom instr of Instrs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ScheduleTopItOpt = std::next(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/vecutils/#a089cccbe66baa77d85c8a291030c7796">VecUtils::getLowest</a>(Instrs)-&gt;getIterator());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// TODO: For now don&#39;t cross BBs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!DAG.getInterval().empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;BB = DAG.getInterval().top()-&gt;getParent();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a61d13d6824ec46c31260a4fd0997eda0">any&#95;of</a>(Instrs, &#91;BB&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;getParent() != BB; &#125;))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Extend the DAG to include Instrs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/interval">Interval&lt;Instruction&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/extension">Extension</a> = DAG.extend(Instrs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add nodes to ready list.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> : <a href="/docs/api/structs/extension">Extension</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> = DAG.getNode(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>-&gt;ready())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">        ReadyList.insert(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try schedule all nodes until we can schedule Instrs back-to-back.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> tryScheduleUntil(Instrs);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unhandled BndlSchedState enum&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#ifndef NDEBUG</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/scheduler/#a113dcc23dbfd41addaba405a2b7ce30e"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/scheduler/#a6a39dd033ba9a22a413f05b32f498509">Scheduler::dump</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;OS)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">  OS &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;ReadyList:\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ReadyList.dump(OS);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/scheduler/#a6a39dd033ba9a22a413f05b32f498509"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/scheduler/#a6a39dd033ba9a22a413f05b32f498509">Scheduler::dump</a>()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/scheduler/#a6a39dd033ba9a22a413f05b32f498509">dump</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>()); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
